ValidationRule.description: This is created as part of GTMS-26594 to prevent ADR Manager updating the ADR Transfer Status field
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(ADR_Transfer_Status__c), CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "ADR"), CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "Manager"), NOT(AND( Rejected_by_ADR_Manager__c = TRUE, ISPICKVAL(Rejection_Reason__c, 'ADR Manager Audit - Does not meet criteria') )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: ADR Managers are not permitted to modify the ADR Transfer Status.
